pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
Hi Carlos, I have been able to figure out how to load submeshes in the `.sdf` file, but it appears that the same cannot be done in a `.urdf` file. I haven’t gotten it to work yet. I will try a bit more and if it doesn’t work I will try to break up the dae file.

[http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/6533/equivalent-of-submesh-tag-of-sdf-in-urdf/](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/6533/equivalent-of-submesh-tag-of-sdf-in-urdf)

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/321989447-No_Submesh.png)
content.html:
Hi Carlos, I have been able to figure out how to load submeshes in the .sdf file, but it appears that the same cannot be done in a .urdf file. I haven’t gotten it to work yet. I will try a bit more and if it doesn’t work I will try to break up the dae file.

http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/6533/equivalent-of-submesh-tag-of-sdf-in-urdf/
